name: monetaverde
short_description:
Moneta Verde is the first cryptocoin with blockreward increasing together with difficulty.

Merged mining with Bytecoin, QuazarCoin, Monero or any other CryptoNight-based coin.

Moneta Verde (it) means "green coin": this coin uses already existing mining resources (MM) and it's supply is regulated by mining community.

Specifications:

- block target - 60 seconds
-  block_reward = log2(difficulty) * 2^40(difficulty)
- CryptoNight PoW
- merged mining with Bytecoin, QuazarCoin, Monero or any other CryptoNight-based coin
- total supply: infinite

Launch date:
June 17, 2014.

Website: http://monetaverde.org/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MonetaVerde
Reddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/MonetaVerde
